channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Notice
item.description: Spoc.unimi.it, servicemanagement.unimi.it, InformaStudenti and reclamistudenti.unimi.it will be unavailable from Friday 29 November 2 pm to Monday 2 December 2 pm.%0A

item.title: VI Kick-off day School of Exercise and Sports Sciences
item.description: On the occasion of the start of academic activities, the School of Exercise and Sports Sciences is organising the VI edition of the Kick-off meeting on Monday, 18 November, in the Great Hall of the via Festa del Perdono 7 campus.%0ARegistration will start at 8.30 am, while the event will begin at 9.30 am.%0AGet all the details in the flyer below.%0A%0AüìÑ Kick-off day 2024 flyer

item.title: Faculty Championship 2025
item.description: To encourage students to participate in the competitions, classes will be suspended on the following dates: %0A‚Ä¢ Tuesday, 15 April 2025 ONLY for students of the LITA campus in Segrate (from 11 am onwards)%0A%0A‚Ä¢ Wednesday, 21 May 2025 for all students of the Faculty of Medicine (all classes scheduled for the day). %0A%0A

item.title: Prof. Gregory Klass (Georgetown University) lectures
item.description: Law students are invited to the lectures to be given by Prof. Gregory Klass from Georgetown University, Washington D.C. (11-21 November 2024). Participation is free of charge. More info below.%0A%0AüìÑ Prof. Klass lectures schedule

item.title: Law and Humanities Library: reopening of the Sala del Settecento

item.description: The University of Milan has established 2 study awards, each in the amount of ‚Ç¨2,500, for students enrolled on-track in the second year of a single-cycle Master's degree programme in Medicine and Surgery.%0AApplication deadline: 6 December 2024.%0A%0Aüîó Call for applications 2024/2025

item.title: Study awards in memory of G. Beani and R. Sampietro
item.description: The University of Milan has established 2 study awards in memory of Dr. Giannino Beani and Prof. Roberto Sampietro, each in the amount of ‚Ç¨2,000, for students enrolled on-track in the third year of a single-cycle Master's degree programme in Medicine and Surgery.%0AApplication deadline: 13 December 2024%0A%0Aüîó Call for applications 2024/2025
